title: The Pegasus Audio Pack
description: The Pegasus pack is an audio pack you can use to create the sounds of the horse with wings Mythological creature called Pegasus
longDescription:
This is a construction pack that includes numerous audio files for creating sounds of a pegasus-like creature


AUDIO DEMO


Pegasus Hoof Attack 1 Sound of hoofs hitting / kicking

Pegasus Hoof Attack 2 Sound of hoofs hitting / kicking

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Hoof Attacks
  • Horn Impale
  • Hoof Steps (On different surfaces)
  • Horse Neigh SFX
  • Wing Flap


Number of Audio Waves: 120

Number of Audio Cues: 120

Sample rate / bit rate: (44,100 Hz 24 Bit)

Do Sound FX loop: (Some of them Do)

Minutes of audio provided: 5:24

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: (Yes)

Mac: (Yes)

Documentation: Link

Important/Additional Notes:
